headline: AVIATION EQUIPMENT PROCESSING Acquires VANTAGE ASSOCIATES in Strategic Transaction; Impact Capital Group Inc. Serves as Exclusive Advisor
summary: LOS ANGELES, February 23, 2026--Aviation Equipment Processing ("AEP") is a premier processing, bonding, and composites company serving both the commercial and military aerospace industries. AEP is one of the few companies approved to do Phosphoric Acid Anodizing (PAA) for Boeing, Lockheed Martin, Northrop Grumman, Robinson Helicopter and many other primes. AEP supplies companies across the globe with superior service, top quality workmanship, and the best turnaround times possible from its 45,00
